dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Ah... What is it? Slowly, I've got a hell of a hangover.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Ugh... Damn hangovers... Ah, a contract? I'm sorry, but please go talk to the other— Hurk.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Phew, I'm finally starting to feel a bit better. I think I'll skip wine this lunch.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
Ah, I'm meeting someone for dinner tonight, so if you'll excuse me...
... Am I going out for drinks again? Well, it's not like I have a choice in the matter! It's for a meeting with a very important client, I'll have you know.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Sometimes, what you need is a daring decision.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Keep your friends close. You never know when or where they'll come in handy.
... I'm too materialistic? Don't be so obtuse. I'm not talking about money... exclusively.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Haah... I'm already nervous. We're going to have to take the WARP train for this contract, but every time I ride one of those things I feel like I'm about to hurl.
Ugh, it's not because I'm drunk!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: I can be pretty crafty when it comes to fighting. Now, observe. Instead of going in straight for an attack, create an opening through a parry first!... Before taking them out.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
These scuffles were around every corner when I lived in the Backstreets. That's why, if it's not anything too challenging, I'd rather leave it to the other two...
But things don't always work out the way I want them to, do they?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Water... I need some water...

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Do I really need to get involved in this...? But since you're asking nicely, sure.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Ah... Heading out?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: W—wait up, slow down a sec...

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: What, something wrong?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Let's get this party started.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah~ Did I hit ya too hard?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tsk.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Phew! Hmph, you could’ve tried dodging that.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Suppose... I went in too deep... without a good backup... That was foolish... of me.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Huh? That's it...?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Dammit... Should've sobered up first.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I wasn't even trying that hard. Not bad though, huh?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Another tale to share with my drinking buddies. Huhu, excellent.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: No... way...! Haah, was it my fault...?
